Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Imperialist \Im*pe"ri*al*ist\, n. [Cf. F. imp['e]rialiste.] One who serves an emperor; one who favors imperialism. [1913 Webster]
imperialist adj : of or relating to imperialism; "imperialistic wars" [syn: {imperialistic}] n : a believer in imperialism
